LightningComponentBundle.description: Custom implementation of lightning-input with a type of Text

property.name: label
property.label: Field Label
property.description: Provide the field label / title for output

property.name: placeholder
property.label: Field Placeholder
property.description: Provide a placeholder for the field as an example

property.name: value
property.label: Field Value
property.description: This is the current and new value for this field

property.name: fieldLevelHelp
property.label: Field Level Help
property.description: Provide some guidance text that will appear in the help popup icon

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: Set this if you want this field to be required for input

property.name: disabled
property.label: Disabled
property.description: Set this if you want to disable the ability to interact with this field

property.name: readOnly
property.label: Read Only
property.description: Set this if you want to make the input read only but still appear as an input field

property.name: maxLength
property.label: Maximum Character Length
property.description: Set the maximum number of characters allowed for this field

property.name: minLength
property.label: Minimum Character Length
property.description: Set the minimum number of characters allowed for this field

property.name: messageWhenValueMissing
property.label: Required value missing message
property.description: Provide text here that will appear if you have set the field as required, this can appear twice during the process, once if the user clicks into the field and doesn't set a value and then again if the user presses next/finish within the flow.

property.name: messageWhenTooLong
property.label: Message when too many characters provided
property.description: Provide text here to display on the component when the number of characters provided is greater than your set limit.

property.name: messageWhenTooShort
property.label: Message when not enought characters provided
property.description: Provide text here to display on the component when the number of characters provided is less then you set limit

property.name: showCharacterCount
property.label: Display the character count
property.description: Set this if you would like to display the character counter for the user as feedback during entering of their text

property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: The variant changes the appearance of an input field. Accepted variants include standard, label-inline, label-hidden, and label-stacked. This value defaults to standard, which displays the label above the field. Use label-hidden to hide the label but make it available to assistive technology. Use label-inline to horizontally align the label and input field. Use label-stacked to place the label above the input field.
